h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter
content: He can also perform a tricky move to counter where he jumps into the air, and pauses for a moment before slamming down with his rake. He'll immediately slide past you, pivoting to slam down again when you think you've evaded the attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
He can also perform a tricky move to counter where he jumps into the air, and pauses for a moment before slamming down with his rake. He'll immediately slide past you, pivoting to slam down again when you think you've evaded the attack.
